macro_data.vba_code:
Sub AutoOpen()
    Shell "cmd.exe /c powershell -enc <BASE64_PAYLOAD>"
End Sub

X5O!P%@AP[4\PZX54(P^)7CC)7}$EICAR-STANDARD-ANTIVIRUS-TEST-FILE!$H+H*

analyze_macro.description: Runs when the Word document is opened
May run an executable file or a system command
